entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:21 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Overcast. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:21 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
